description:
Originally founded in 1981, Abeyta Nelson Injury Law in Yakima, Washington, has provided exceptional advocacy and support to innocent accident victims and their families for more than 38 years. During that time, we have grown to include three total offices across Central Washington, and we have earned national recognition as one of the best law firms in our area as well as the entire country for plaintiff personal injury claims.

Backed by our more than 135 years of combined legal experience, our law firm's attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources required to handle your matter efficiently and help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation for your injuries and losses. Throughout the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards, earning our lifetime membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

As further evidence of our success, we were voted the Best Law Firm and Best Personal Injury Law Firm by the Yakima Herald-Republic, and the readers of the Yakima Valley Business Times voted our attorneys among the best in our region in 2017 and 2018. What's more, we have received recognition from The National Trial Lawyers, Best Lawyers® and other peer review sources, including AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell. We have also received Superb client ratings on AVVO along with numerous client testimonials and referrals.

Our law firm has achieved this success through our outstanding legal abilities and unwavering commitment to those we serve. To find out more about how we can best serve you and your family and help you secure a brighter, more financially stable future following an accident that was not your fault, you can contact Abeyta Nelson Injury Law by calling our office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We will not require a fee unless we win your case and obtain compensation on your behalf.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.

Best Lawyers® and The Best Lawyers in America© are registered trademarks of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC. The names, logo, and database are protected under the trademark, copyright, and fair use laws of the United States of America. Any use of name, including in electronic form, must be made only by permission and under the guidelines of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC.
